category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Set the current game for the Raidplaner.

category.name: wcf.acp.pip
category.item: The game identifier is used to update games and for game-related language item names. The identifier consists of least four segments separated by dots. Each segment must not be empty and may only contain the following characters: <kbd>[A-z0-9-_]</kbd>. In general, the first part of the game identifier is the package identifier. Example: <kbd>dev.daries.rp.game.foobar</kbd>
This identifier is already used by another game.
This game identifier only contains {#$segmentCount} segment{if $segmentCount > 1}s{/if}.
The <kbd>rpGame</kbd> package installation plugin installs new games.
